#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>

using namespace std;
typedef long long int ll;


ll fun(ll a,ll b){
	if(a>b)
		return a;
	else
		return b;
	}


ll gcd(ll a,ll b){
	if(b==0)
		return a;
	else
		return gcd(b,a%b);
	}



int main(){
	int t;
	long long int a,b;
		scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		cin>>a>>b;
		long long int c=gcd(a,b);
		if(a==b)
			cout<<0<<endl;
		else{
			cout<<fun(a,b)/c-2<<endl;
			}
		}
return 0;
}
